item.title: Exploration of gender inequality with regards to different provinces
item.description: Author: Xingkun Yin Abstract I investigated in CES 2019 Phone sruvey dataset. I expect more developd provinces with higher average income do better in gender equality. Performed data diagnistics, and results showed surprisingly otherwise. Introduction Gender inequality is one of the many social problems that our modern society still not able to resolve. It is necessary for us to find out what factors are related to this problem so that we may eventually get rid of this issue.
